main.title: 2180 Balanced Model
main.text: 2180 balanced model (2180 for short) is a 2U 1-socket rack server. It features high-performance computing, large-capacity storage, low power consumption, easy management, and easy deployment and is ideal for Internet, distributed storage, cloud computing, Big Data, and enterprise services.
bottomTip1: Move the mouse to rotate the model
bottomTip2: Move the mouse to move the model
bottomTip3: Move the mouse to zoom in or out the model
usb_node: The USB ports allow USB devices to be connected to the server.
riser1_node: I/O module 1 can be configured with a rear drive module with two 2.5-inch drives or a PCIe riser module (PRM).
riser2_node: I/O module 2 can be configured with a rear drive module with two 2.5- or 3.5-inch drives.
nic_node: The FlexIO card can be configured with a TM210 NIC.
power_node: The PSUs are hot-swappable and work in 1+1 redundancy mode.
mgmt_node: This 1000 Mbps Ethernet port is used for server management, and supports 10/100/1000 Mbps auto-negotiation.
fan_node: Four hot-swappable fan modules, providing protection against single-fan failure
dimm_node: Up to 16 DDR4 DIMM slots, supporting RDIMMs.
cpu_node: One Kunpeng 920 processor with 64-core, 48-core, or 32-core configuration at 2.6 GHz.
